properties.Name: IngredientPurposeType
properties.Description:
The purpose for using an ingredient.

Ex:
- Cross-Linkers
- Solubility enhancers
         Hydrotropes
         Small Amines
- Bleaching agents
- Preservatives/Antioxidant
- Rheology Modifiers
- Plasticizers
- Foam Boosters, Defoamers and Antifoamers
- Denaturants
- Absorbents and Adsorbents
- Corrosion inhibitors
- Antiredisposition agent
- Dispersing agent
- Coalescing agent
- Dyes & Optical Brighteners
- Antioxidant
- Emollient
- Emulsifier
- Moisturizer
- Pigment
- Sunscreen
- Surfactant
- Viscosity Control

Columns.Name: IngredientPurposeTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Ingredient Purpose Type.

Columns.Name: IngredientPurposeTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of an Ingredient Purpose Type.

Columns.Name: IngredientPurposeTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of an Ingredient Purpose Type.
